🚇➡️🚇 **TRANSFER AT YENIKAPI**
From M2 to MARMARAY
⏱️ 3 min • 🚶 80m

**Step-by-Step Instructions:**
  1️⃣ Exit the M2 train at Yenikapı
  2️⃣ Exit M2 platform and look for yellow Marmaray signs
  3️⃣ Take escalator down one level
  4️⃣ Follow the passage (approximately 50 meters)
  ✅ Board MARMARAY train
  ⏱️ Total transfer time: approximately 3 minutes

📍 **Platform Info:** M2: Level -3 → MARMARAY: Level -4 (deepest)

👁️ **Look for:**
  • Large modern station with high ceilings
  • Look for the digital arrival boards
  • Blue mosaic artwork on M2 level
  • Yellow Marmaray signage with modern design

♿ **Accessibility:** Elevators, Escalators, Wheelchair accessible
